sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category>professional_experience</category> <default_for/> <description>have served for at least 36 full months, which do not have to be consecutive, as an official or temporary agent or contract agent of the Commission</description> <duration_months>36</duration_months> <number>RQL0001017</number> <short_description>NOT Consecutive [36 months]</short_description> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-18 08:54:50</sys_created_on> <sys_id>916ccff2473e6110691e7258946d43c0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>nappoma</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-18 11:02:33</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library> </record_update>
